title: Secrets of the X chromosome - Robin Ball

multiple-choice.question: What is the primary function of the X chromosome in humans?

options.label: C
options.text: To control sex determination and reproduction

options.label: A

options.label: A

options.label: B

multiple-choice.question: What is the purpose of the Barr body?

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: D
options.text: It is a process that occurs only in females
